BRIEF-Aj Lucas Group Says OCP Asia Agreed To Amend Terms Of Co's Loan Note Facility

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 30, 2019 20:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Aj Lucas Group Says OCP Asia Agreed To Amend Terms Of Co's Loan Note Facility Sept 30 (Reuters) - AJ Lucas Group Ltd : * OCP ASIA AGREED TO AMEND TERMS OF AJL'S LOAN NOTE FACILITY, DEFERRING REQUIREMENT TO PAYDOWN PRINCIPAL OUTSTANDING TO US$20 MILLION * NEGOTIATING WITH NEW LENDERS FOR TOTAL REFINANCING OF EXISTING LOAN NOTE FACILITY UNDER NEW DEBT PACKAGE WITH MINIMUM 3-YEAR DURATION
